mutants.original_line: parser.add_argument('-o', dest='output_file', help='Name of the exported source file')
mutants.mutated_line: parser.add_argument('', dest='output_file', help='Name of the exported source file')
mutants.code:
import argparse
import os

def get_exported_source_file_name(args):
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Process command-line arguments')
    parser.add_argument('', dest='output_file', help='Name of the exported source file')
    parsed_args = parser.parse_args(args)
    if parsed_args.output_file:
        return parsed_args.output_file
    else:
        (input_file_name, input_file_ext) = os.path.splitext(args[0])
        return input_file_name + '.cpp'
